products.forensicsDesc: Advanced blockchain investigation platform for tracing crypto linked to crime
products.forensicsTagline: Trace and Act on Crypto Linked to Crime
products.forensicsDetails: TRM Forensics enables investigators to easily trace multi-chain paths, visualize the flow of crypto, and enhance collaboration securely.
products.transactionMonitoringDesc: Real-time transaction monitoring and risk detection
products.transactionMonitoringDetails: Monitor crypto transactions as they happen and automatically flag suspicious activity.
products.walletScreeningDesc: Pre-screen wallets for risk exposure before transactions
products.walletScreeningDetails: Assess wallet risk before transacting with comprehensive screening and analysis tools.
products.triageDesc: Streamline crypto investigations with intelligent case management
products.triageDetails: Triage and prioritize crypto cases efficiently with intelligent assessment and case management tools.

solutions.lawEnforcementDesc: Complete solution for law enforcement agencies
solutions.lawEnforcementTagline: Maximize Your Agency's Crypto Investigation Outcomes
solutions.lawEnforcementDetails: Accelerate investigations and seize stolen or illicitly obtained assets with amlFraud's blockchain intelligence platform.
solutions.bankingDesc: Comprehensive compliance solution for financial institutions
solutions.bankingDetails: Meet regulatory requirements and manage crypto risk with amlFraud's banking compliance solution.

home.heroSubtitle: Comprehensive tools for investigating crypto crime and ensuring regulatory compliance
